title: looking for people to play with
body: im a 40 year old guy looking for people to play with, I am not real flash bronze 3 right now but I had a big left hand injury actally a few over my life and I play to help it with keeping it active, long story short work accident lots of money payout no more work but anyhow, I am looking for people to do norm's with maybe ranked from time to time I am easy going can use voice chat, I listen to advice, and looking for people to help me along and improve add me if you want some friendly norms with an old fart

replies.body: rofl  hope that was a joke
I'll play with you, I'm only 16 though lol, don't snatch me.
